name: Space Jam (itch) (Lil_Nochi)
description:
Story
In a galaxy too far away to be known, the survival of the last colonists hangs on the line as a seemingly endless battalion of alien spaceships decide to further their expansion. 
Our hero valiantly takes on the task of halting their advance 
while the colonies evacute to somewhere safe.
Have you the courage and will to give out your life in order to save the others?

Controls

WASD or Arrow Keys - Move
Mouse - Aim
Left Click - Shoot
Spacebar Or Left Shift - Dash
ESC - Pause Menu
R - Restart The Game

Description/Info
In this game the player goes against endless waves of enemies that come out of the portals, the portals can be destroyed but more will take their place, its an endless bullet hellish kinda of game with an highscore, made with much love and filled with bugs.
It was made for Minijam #77,  the theme was Courage, and the limitation "Cannot take place on earth", this is way the game takes place in a galaxy far away and the player having to be brave enough to sacrifice himself in order to save the colonies (even tho theres no mention of it in the game)

Game by Lil_Nochi and Zilexarpy
Code: Lil_Nochi and Zilexarpy
Art: Lil_Nochi
Sounds and Music: ZapSplat.com; epidemicsound.com; fesliyanstudios.com
